item.title: Fractured cast iron transmission housing repaired
item.description: A damaged cast iron transmission housing gets a second life through careful repair and machining. What does it take to restore strength and alignment to cast iron?

media:content.media:title: Fractured cast iron transmission housing repaired
media:content.media:description: A damaged cast iron transmission housing gets a second life through careful repair and machining. What does it take to restore strength and alignment to cast iron?

item.title: Custom boring bar for hard-to-reach gear faces
item.description: Designing and machining a custom boring bar to reach difficult gear faces. When standard tools won’t work, custom solutions step in.

item.title: CAT 24M grader accumulators seized solid
item.description: With no replacement parts available, these seized CAT 24M accumulators head to the lathe. Can machining save what’s otherwise scrap?

item.title: Installing a new Duo-Cone ring on a dozer final drive
item.description: Careful fitting of a Duo-Cone seal on a dozer final drive spindle. Why is precision critical when sealing heavy machinery components?

item.title: Steps to replace an excavator tooth adapter
item.description: Breaking down the correct process for removing and installing a new tooth adapter. What steps matter most for durability and safety?

item.title: Upgrading the Zayer milling machine
item.description: Precision upgrades bring new life and capability to the Zayer milling machine. How do small improvements boost accuracy and performance?

item.title: The Mother of All Cutters is complete ⚙️
item.description: After extensive machining and fabrication, the Mother of All Cutters is finally finished. What does it take to build a tool designed for serious industrial work?

item.title: Franna crane winch rebuild begins
item.description: The Franna crane project moves into a critical phase as the winch teardown and rebuild gets underway. What challenges come with restoring heavy lifting equipment?

item.title: Workshop antics with the missus
item.description: A lighter moment in the workshop as the workday mixes with a bit of humor and teamwork. Can’t beat a good laugh between serious jobs.

item.title: CAT 24M grader accumulator repair
item.description: Seized solid with no replacement parts available, these CAT 24M grader accumulators head to the lathe for precision machining and repair. How do you save a component when replacements don’t exist?

item.title: Restoring a vintage Huron slotting attachment
item.description: Bringing a vintage Huron slotting attachment back into working condition through careful repair and machining. What makes restoring older equipment so rewarding?

item.title: Repairing a Caterpillar 785 dog bone linkage
item.description: Precision repair work on a dog bone linkage from a Caterpillar 785 haul truck, focusing on machining accuracy and structural integrity. Why do these components demand exact tolerances?

item.title: Machining a large excavator cylinder rod
item.description: Precision machining of a massive hydraulic cylinder rod for a mining excavator, focusing on accuracy, tooling, and handling heavy components. What challenges come with parts of this scale?

item.title: Air arc gouging: a step-by-step repair technique
item.description: Breaking down the air arc gouging process used in repair work, showing proper setup, control, and technique for removing damaged material efficiently. When is air arc gouging the right solution?

item.title: Machining a new D11T trunnion
item.description: Manufacturing a new trunnion for a D11T bulldozer blade lift cylinder barrel using precision machining techniques. What goes into producing components for machines of this size?

item.title: Building heavy-duty roller stands
item.description: Fabricating new roller stands designed to support large, heavy components in the workshop. How do custom stands improve safety and workflow?

item.title: Portable bore welding on the mill
item.description: Using a Sir Meccanica WS2 portable bore welder to repair bores vertically while they remain set up on the mill. How does in-place welding improve accuracy and efficiency?

item.title: Excavator arm and bucket restoration
item.description: Restoring an excavator arm and bucket by machining and installing new thrust plates to bring worn components back to spec. What details matter most during heavy equipment rebuilds?

item.title: Assembling planetary gears in a Franna winch
item.description: A step-by-step look at installing planetary gears inside a Franna winch drum, highlighting precision, alignment, and engineering techniques. What makes gear assembly so critical for smooth operation?

item.title: Reviving CAT’s largest dozer
item.description: A detailed look at bringing one of CAT’s biggest dozers back to working condition, covering inspection, repairs, and restoration techniques. What challenges come with machines of this size?
